title: #56 - The Naked, Knife Wielding Evangelist - The Ugliness of Otis Nixon
description:
This week, we delve into a story of constant criminal stupidity, followed by second chances, and even more criminal stupidity. He must have thought he could get away with anything, based on his behavior. Doing things like scamming people when they're at their lowest, sexual assault, naked knife wielding, and a whole lot of cocaine, to name a few. His tumultuous life goes from charity events, to county jail, and back again. We will give him one thing, he is never dull. Steal second base, take all of your clothes off, and threaten to cut someone's heart out with Otis Nixon!! Check us out, every Tuesday. We will continue to bring you the biggest idiots in sports history!

Hosted by James Pietragallo & Jimmie Whisman
